Do You Need To Be Cruel To An Evil Hare To Get Ghost?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 1 Archive (PSOne): Hoaxes, Myths, and Pranks!: Do You Need To Be Cruel To An Evil Hare To Get Ghost?
By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, August 1, 2001 - 07:14 pm:

Research done by several people have proven that the breed you use to get a Ghost does not matter, and how it is treated during its life also does not matter.

See the Ghost section for more details.
